ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: sup moonie!! yeah, Chorus of Clarity stacks with CoReplenishment, the casters gasp at the mana regen. Only CoR has the icon, so it ll drop after you leave it
ygData.messageBody:
sup moonie!!

yeah, Chorus of Clarity stacks with CoReplenishment, the casters gasp at the
mana regen. Only CoR has the icon, so it'll drop after you leave it on for 2
pulses for some reason. Fflewdeur was explaining to me when I first got it,
I didn't understand fully, I just nodded and complied lol :)
But during battle, i prefer to go with Cantana and something else, any other
2, not Chorus of Clarity. sometimes I'm in the mood for Niv's and a haste
or other atk song to keep everyone quiet.

Tank 1 = can i get haste?
Rogue 1 = Can i get str?
Caster1, 2 & 3 = oom!

Bard = Coming, shush it! :)
